children.name: open
children.description: Fires when the ModalView is shown.

children.name: init
children.description: Fired when the mobile ModalView and its child widgets are initialized.

children.name: close
children.description: Fired when the mobile ModalView is closed by the user.

children.name: beforeOpen
children.description: Fires before the ModalView is shown. calling `preventDefault` on the event argument will cancel the open.

children.name: destroy
children.description: Prepares the **ModalView** for safe removal from DOM. Detaches all event handlers and removes jQuery.data attributes to avoid memory leaks. Calls destroy method of any child Kendo widgets.> **Important:** This method does not remove the ModalView element from DOM.

children.name: width
children.description: The width of the ModalView container in pixels. If not set, the element style is used.

children.name: modal
children.description: When set to false, the ModalView will close when the user taps outside of its element.

children.name: height
children.description: The height of the ModalView container in pixels. If not set, the element style is used.
